subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Zack Wheeler provided more glimpses of the ability that could make him a rotation mainstay, but he and the Mets wasted a ninth-inning comeback and watched the White Sox celebrate the win.
snippet: Zack Wheeler provided more glimpses of the ability that could make him a rotation mainstay, but he and the Mets wasted a ninth-inning comeback and watched the White Sox celebrate the win.
